text: An election to Galway County Council took place on 27 June 1991 as part of that year's Irish local elections. 30 councillors were elected from five electoral divisions by PR-STV voting for a five-year term of office. ==Results by party== {| class=wikitable ! colspan=2 align=center|Party ! valign=top|Seats ! valign=top|± ! valign=top|First Pref. votes ! valign=top|FPv% ! valign=top|±% |- | align=right|14 | align=right|-3 | align=right|25,630 | align=right|44.89% | align=right| |- | align=right|10 | align=right|+1 | align=right|15,976 | align=right|27.98% | align=right| |- | align=right|4 | align=right|+4 | align=right|6,177 | align=right|10.82% | align=right| |- | align=right|2 | align=right|-1 | align=right|7,630 | align=right|13.36% | align=right| |- \--> | align=right|0 | align=right|-1 | align=right|- | align=right|- | align=right| |- | colspan=2 align=center|Totals | align=right |30 | align=center|- | align=right |57,093 | align=center|100% | align=center|— |} ==Results by Electoral Area== ===Ballinasloe=== ===Connemara=== ===Galway=== ===Loughrea=== ===Tuam=== ==External links== * Official website * Irishelectionliterature Category:1991 Irish local elections 1991
title: 1991 Galway County Council election
